function_call.name: classify_mitigation
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_mitigations":[{"name":"Provide training and support for educators to improve online teaching methods, and encourage interactive and engaging content on educational apps.","category":"Support recovery of sectors via remote work","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Regular satellite maintenance and timely replacement of aging satellites","category":"Maintenance / decontamination of building water sytems","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Development of improved gps technology to account for obstructed environments","category":"Selection of materials","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Implement privacy and security measures, such as encryption, user consent, and secure data handling protocols.","category":"Facilitate transparent communication","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Implement robust data encryption, authentication mechanisms, and user consent controls to ensure data privacy and security.","category":"Implement robust privacy protection measures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Implementing robust privacy protection measures, user consent for data collection, and strict data access controls.","category":"Implement robust privacy protection measures","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Improving network reliability and speed, implementing backup connectivity options","category":"Monitor and control indoor air quality","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Implementing strong data encryption, secure data storage practices, and regular security audits","category":"Control of airflows in spaces & Avoid air recirculation","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Implementing robust data security measures, encryption, access control, and compliance with privacy regulations","category":"Raising awareness","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Developing architecture with a focus on human well-being and safety","category":"Environmental parameters control","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Re-design building spaces to incorporate natural elements like sunshine, natural ventilation, and connections to nature","category":"Control of airflows in spaces & Avoid air recirculation","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use natural lighting and ventilation systems in building design, prioritize biophilic design principles","category":"Natural ventilation increase","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Implementing measures to improve ventilation, sanitation, and hygiene in densely built spaces, as well as promoting urban green spaces to mitigate the effects of overbuilding.","category":"Natural ventilation increase","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Incorporating green spaces, urban gardening, and biophilic design principles in densely built areas to provide opportunities for nature interaction and relaxation.","category":"Greenery","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Regular monitoring of public health and government announcements, strict enforcement of regulations, and adherence to guidelines.","category":"Early detection","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Strict enforcement of policies, provision of remote work options, and support for affected workers.","category":"Greywater management","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Provision of support, guidance, and counseling for affected workers, clear communication to reduce stigma, and promotion of reporting symptoms.","category":"Occupancy control (eg separating at/risk contaminated population)","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Encourage and adopt new modes of communication such as videoconferencing and innovative remote communication tools.","category":"Enhanced ventilation systems","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Assess possibility of procurement procedure changes, consider local suppliers, and ensure availability of labor, equipment, and materials.","category":"Absorb surge in service demande","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Conducting repeated data collection during several stages of the covid-19 pandemic to gather more comprehensive data","category":"Infection tracking / monitoring","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Continuously monitoring the evolving situation and adapting the response plan accordingly","category":"Ensuring use of personal protection equipment","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Repeating data collection at multiple stages of the pandemic to ensure the accuracy and comprehensiveness of the data","category":"Absorb surge in service demande","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Implementing strict health and safety protocols, remote work policies, vaccination campaigns","category":"Prevent fake news","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Enhanced ventilation systems, regular testing and health screening, remote monitoring","category":"Natural ventilation increase","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Develop specific response plan and guidelines tailored to construction industry needs.","category":"Shift controls occupancy control of total users","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Conduct thorough research and consult with industry experts for comprehensive insights.","category":"Quarantine support","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Implement robust data collection methods and ensure data accuracy through validation processes.","category":"Infection tracking / monitoring","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Implement strict health and safety protocols, provide regular testing and vaccination, promote remote work where possible","category":"Personal hygiene eg handwashing","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Clear communication of government policies, promoting risk management strategies, fostering industry collaboration","category":"Support recovery of sectors via remote work","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Combine wastewater surveillance with clinical testing for accurate assessment.","category":"Selection of materials","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Developing quantitative models to correct for variables affecting wastewater surveillance data and exploring complex models to understand the correlation.","category":"Animal vectors control","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Regular monitoring and analysis of wastewater for early detection and response to potential outbreaks.","category":"Infection tracking / monitoring","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Enhance the virus detection method through process improvements and validation","category":"Infection tracking / monitoring","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Conducting procedures in a controlled environment with proper ventilation and waste disposal","category":"Occupancy control eg separating at/risk contaminated population","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Implementing strict hygiene measures, including handwashing and sanitization of surfaces. also, proper management of sewage and wastewater.","category":"Personal hygiene eg handwashing","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Implement flexible integration of public transport services and on-demand/sharing services, accompanied by serious sanitising measures","category":"Implement "}]}
